main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Kittery, Maine on April 5, 1966.
interesting points: The object was first seen on the ground and then rose above the tree line,The object was observed through binoculars from about 3/4 mile away,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, The object was described to be the size and speed of a helicopter, There was no outline of the object and it emitted an intense red color.
witness description: civilian observers including a person from the Naval Base
